name: Parcel Panic (itch) (Polar)
description:
"Your goal is to collect parcels from the conveyor and pass them to the correct customer to fulfil their collection order. Each customer has a number corresponding to their parcel.

However, people are impatient. Take too long and they will leave."

Welcome to Parcel Panic! This has been my personal project for the past few months and I'm excited to see what people think of it. Obviously, this game is STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT so if you find any issues or think of something that would be cool to add then please leave me some feedback.

Have fun!
